# Problem 1

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(p8105.datasets)

data("ny_noaa")

ny_noaa_cleaned <- ny_noaa %>%
  mutate(
    year = lubridate::year(date),
    month = lubridate::month(date),
    day = lubridate::day(date),
    tmax = as.numeric(tmax) / 10,   # Convert temperature from tenths of degrees C to degrees C
    tmin = as.numeric(tmin) / 10,   # Convert temperature from tenths of degrees C to degrees C
    prcp = as.numeric(prcp) / 10    # Convert precipitation from tenths of mm to mm
  )

snowfall_values <- ny_noaa_cleaned %>%
  count(snow) %>%
  arrange(desc(n)) %>%
  head(10)

print(snowfall_values)
```
